```{r}
#scran normalize

sce_sc_10x_5cl_qc <- logNormCounts(sce_sc_10x_5cl_qc)

#get variable genes
stats <- scran::modelGeneVar(logcounts(sce_sc_10x_5cl_qc))
var.features <- scran::getTopHVGs(stats, n = 3000)

#PCA reduction
```
